com.haydende.heymusic

Class MusicDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.room.RoomDatabase
      • com.haydende.heymusic.MusicDatabase

  • public abstract class MusicDatabase
extends androidx.room.RoomDatabase
    Class for modelling Room Database.

    Builds Room Database of Artist, Album and Song tables.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class androidx.room.RoomDatabase
